about_the_game:
You're a freelancer who usually does copywriting. But one day you get an unexpected email. Your new client wants to write a book and is offering you a very tempting fee!

But his ideas and narrative style don't seem to work... So your first task is to choose a genre and gather more material. And since the best works reflect our lives, it's time to make that life more exciting!

For example, through new casual encounters with bright and unusual girls. Who will become your muse and help you write a real bestseller?


Emy… Is she rich and mysterious because she is a vampire – or is she a vampire because she is rich and mysterious? And most importantly, what is behind the image of a spoiled and demanding girl?


Nia is an aspiring streamer and a wild lover of extreme sports. She seems normal compared to her friends, but will you be able to keep up with her pace and overcome her tough personality?


Uma is a cute owner of a magical trinket shop. Her enthusiasm is contagious and her magic really seems to work. It's time to explore an unknown world!


Six is like she came from another planet. Maybe you can really learn about the secrets of distant space from her? Why does she like Earth out of all the other planets?

EmyLiveShow: How To Write A Bestseller – is a visual novel using multiple routes and QTE mechanics.


  • 4 stories with different aesthetics. One day you're at a fancy vampire party, the next day you're in space. It can also be just a step from modern extreme sports to medieval magic. Everything depends on which story you want to tell this time.

  • Romantic mood. How To Write A Bestseller takes the time to focus on the emotional moments. You'll find dates for every taste, from going to the movies to skydiving!

  • Captivating illustrations. The pleasant art style helps immerse you in the story. All the sprites and CGs unlocked during the game can be viewed in the gallery.

  • Customizable protagonist. Choose your character's gender and skin color for the most enjoyable experience. The illustrations of the main character will also adapt to your choice!

  • Original voices of EmyLiveShow vtubers. Partial voiceovers from Emy, Nia, Uma, and Six's voice actors will highlight emotional moments and add volume to the game's characters!

The game may contain LGBTQ+ relationship (depending on the gender of your protagonist)
